channel.name: Datica OCI - HL7 SIU to JSON Transform

step.name: Create the JSON wrapper
MSH (Message Header) Segment
SCH (Schedule Activity Information) Segment
NTE (Notes) Segment
PID (Patient Identification), PD1 (Patient Demographic), and related NTE (Note) Segments
--PV1 (Patient Visit) Segment - REQUIRES PID MAPPING STEP ABOVE
----PV2 (Additional Patient Visit Information) Segment - REQUIRES PV1 MAPPING STEP ABOVE
--OBX (Observation) Segment - REQUIRES PID MAPPING STEP ABOVE
--DG1 (Diagnosis) Segment - REQUIRES PID MAPPING STEP ABOVE
RGS (Resource Group Segment)
--AIS (Appointment Information - Service) Segment and related NTE (Notes) Segments - REQUIRES RGS MAPPING STEP ABOVE
--AIG (Appointment Information - General Resource) Segment and related NTE (Notes) Segments - REQUIRES RGS MAPPING STEP ABOVE
--AIL (Appointment Information - Location) Segment and related NTE (Notes) Segments - REQUIRES RGS MAPPING STEP ABOVE
--AIP (Appointment Information - Personnel Resource) Segment and related NTE (Notes) Segments - REQUIRES RGS MAPPING STEP ABOVE

channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;

codeTemplateLibrary.name: Datica Mirth OCI Code Template Library

codeTemplate.name: Convert HL7 Date Format to ISO
Convert ISO Date Format to HL7
Get Segments After a Particular Segment
